message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $135.
